import java.math.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        input();
    }
    public static Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);

    static void doIt(BigInteger a, BigInteger b) {
        if(a.toString().compareTo("1") == 0) {
            System.out.print(b);
            return;
        } else if(a.toString().compareTo(b.toString()) == 0) {
            System.out.print("1");
            return;
        } else {
            BigInteger next;
            if(a.remainder(b).toString().compareTo("0") == 0) {
                next = b.divide(a);
            } else {
                next = b.divide(a);
                next = next.add(new BigInteger("1"));
            }
            System.out.print(next+" ");
            a = b.negate().mod(a);
            b = b.multiply(next);
            BigInteger g = a.gcd(b);
            a = a.divide(g);
            b = b.divide(g);
            if(a.toString().compareTo("0") != 0) {
                doIt(a,b);
            }
        }
    }

    static void input() {
        BigInteger a,b;
        a = in.nextBigInteger();
        b = in.nextBigInteger();
        while(a.toString().compareTo("1") != 0 || b.toString().compareTo("1") != 0) {
            doIt(a,b);
            System.out.println();
            a = in.nextBigInteger();
            b = in.nextBigInteger();
        }
    }

}
